content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates; energy: 1600.0.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs for research; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 4248.
- ElectricityGroup with id=4248 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); neighbours include pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5) and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); associated with fluid_system [14556].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); associated with fluid_system [14556].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14556 at approximately (-6.5, 20.5); status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14557 at approximately (-2.5, 20.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14558 at approximately (-0.5, 21.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14563 at approximately (-3.5, 23.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14562 at approximately (-7.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14567 at approximately (3.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14566 at approximately (2.5, 24.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14569 at approximately (-0.5, 28.5); status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Failures:
  - Repeated attempts to supply water to the steam engine using PipeGroups with fluid_system IDs [14212, 14255, 14298, 14341, 14384, 14427, 14470, 14513] resulted in aborted connections. Verify that the targeted PipeGroup exists and is active before initiating a connection.

• Inefficient Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Fixed 10-second wait intervals after each connection attempt introduce unnecessary idle time. Replace static delays with dynamic checks that monitor the pipeline network’s stabilization status.
